title: Benji's very own Christmas story
brief_description: Another story featuring Benji, the canine star of ‘Benji’ and ‘Benji the hunted’. In this adventure, set during Christmas, Benji ventures to the land of Kris Kringle (Santa Clause) where he discovers a secret that could break the hearts of millions of kids. With Benji’s help however, Kris discovers what real love is all about. Created, produced and directed by Joe Camp.
